title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: Create a personal portfolio website to showcase your skills, projects, and experience using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: To-Do List App
description: Build a to-do list application with the ability to add, edit, and delete tasks using React.

title: E-commerce Website
description: Develop a fully functional e-commerce website with product listings, a shopping cart, and a payment gateway integration using Next.js.

title: Weather App
description: Create a weather app that fetches real-time weather data from an API and displays it with a user-friendly interface.

title: Blog Platform
description: Develop a blog platform where users can post articles, comment, and like using Node.js and MongoDB.

title: Chat Application
description: Build a real-time chat application using WebSocket and Express.js.

title: Recipe Finder
description: Create an application where users can search for recipes based on ingredients using an external API.

title: Budget Tracker
description: Build a budget tracking app where users can input income and expenses and see a summary of their financial status.

title: Interactive Quiz App
description: Develop an interactive quiz app with multiple-choice questions and a scoring system using React.

title: Landing Page
description: Design a visually appealing landing page for a product or service using modern CSS frameworks.

title: URL Shortener
description: Build a URL shortener app that takes a long URL and returns a shortened version using Python and Flask.

title: Expense Tracker API
description: Create a RESTful API for an expense tracker app with endpoints for managing transactions using Django.

title: Real-Time Polling App
description: Develop a real-time polling app where users can vote and see live results using Firebase.

title: Photo Gallery
description: Create a photo gallery app that displays images with filtering options using React and Redux.

title: Markdown Editor
description: Build a markdown editor where users can write and preview markdown in real-time using Vue.js.

title: Portfolio CMS
description: Develop a content management system for managing portfolio projects and blog posts using Strapi.

title: Stock Price Tracker
description: Create an app that fetches and displays stock prices in real-time using a financial API.

title: Authentication System
description: Build an authentication system with login, signup, and password reset functionality using Firebase Authentication.

title: Task Management App
description: Develop a task management app with user roles and permissions using Angular and Firebase.

title: Multi-Language Blog
description: Create a multi-language blog with internationalization support using Gatsby.js and i18next.
